cluster_identifier.description: Unique identifier for the cluster. if omitted, a random unique identifier will be generated

availability_zones.description: A list of EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the DB cluster can be created in

backup_retention_period.description: The days to retain backups for, must be between 1 and 35. Defaults to 1. Set to 0 to disable backups. Must be greater than 0 if storage_encrypted is true. If storage_encrypted is false then this attribute is ignored

database_name.description: The name for your database of up to 64 alpha-numeric characters

db_subnet_group_name.description: The DB subnet group to associate with this RDS cluster

enable_global_write_forwarding.description: Specifies whether to enable global write forwarding for the DB cluster

enable_local_write_forwarding.description: Specifies whether to enable local write forwarding for the DB cluster

engine.description: The name of the database engine to be used for this DB cluster

engine_mode.description: The DB engine mode of the DB cluster

engine_version.description: The engine version to use for the new DB cluster

master_password.description: Password for the master DB user

master_username.description: Username for the master DB user

preferred_backup_window.description: The daily time range during which automated backups are created if automated backups are enabled using the BackupRetentionPeriod parameter.Time in UTC

preferred_maintenance_window.description: The weekly time range during which system maintenance can occur, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC)

scaling_configuration.type: list(object({auto_pause: bool, max_capacity: number, min_capacity: number, seconds_before_timeout: number, seconds_until_auto_pause: number, timeout_action: string}))

serverlessv2_scaling_configuration.type: list(object({max_capacity: number, min_capacity: number, seconds_until_auto_pause: number}))

storage_encrypted.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster is encrypted

vpc_security_group_ids.description: List of VPC security groups to associate with the Cluster

kms_key_id.description: value of the KMS key to use for encryption

tags.description: A mapping of AWS tags to assign.

skip_final_snapshot.description: If true, skip the creation of a final snapshot

enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports.description: List of log types to export to cloudwatch

copy_tags_to_snapshot.description: Copy all DB cluster tags to snapshots
